p: Chromatographic separations were performed by analytical TLC on Silica gel 60 F254 (0.2 mm thick), Silica gel 60 (0.063–0.200 mm) for column chromatography (70–230 mesh) (Merck KGaA, Darmstadt, Germany) and solid phase separation on Isolute C 18 columns (10 g; IST, Hengoed, UK). Trisodium citrate was obtained from BDH Chemicals Ltd, England, Giemsa was purchased from ESJAY Chemicals, Maharashtra 401,504, India, and pure chloroquine phosphate was supplied by Ethiopian Pharmaceutical Manufacturing Factory (EPHARM, Ethiopia).
